content.question: Chemical compound that leads to formation of photochemical smog in the troposphere when it reacts with other compounds in the presence of sunlight

choices.label: Nitrates (<math alttext="N O 3 with a negative 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>3</mtext></mrow></msub><msup><mrow></mrow><mrow><mo>âˆ’</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> )
Nitrogen oxides (<math alttext="N O x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>x</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>)

content.answer: Nitrogen oxides (<math alttext="N O x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>x</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>)
